text.div:
X12-CARC-CMS-RARC

Reason codes used to interpret the adjudication denial reason.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://www.x12.org/codes/claim-adjustment-reason-codes
  • Include all codes defined in http://www.wpc-edi.com/remittance-advice-remark

name: X12CARCCMSRARC
title: X12-CARC-CMS-RARC
description: Reason codes used to interpret the adjudication denial reason.
